subtitles_text: >> Jeff: PREVIOUSLY ON "SURVIVOR": 16 CASTAWAYS WERE
AIRLIFTED TO A REMOTE BEACH IN NICARAGUA.
WELCOME TO SURVIVOR!
WHERE THEY WERE SURPRISED BY TWO
OF SURVIVOR'S MOST VILLAINOUS RIVALS.
>> BOSTON ROB!
>> Jeff: BOSTON ROB AND RUSSELL HANTZ.
THESE TWO OFFER 156 DAYS OF
"SURVIVOR" EXPERIENCE.
ROB, YOU JOIN OMETEPE.
RUSSELL HANTZ, YOU JOIN ZAPATERA.
COME ON, RUSSELL, LET'S GO.
>> Jeff: THERE IS ONE MORE TWIST.
WHEN YOU ARE VOTED OUT, YOU WILL
NOT GO HOME.
>> WHAT!
>> Jeff: INSTEAD YOU WILL BE
SENT TO REDEMPTION ISLAND, WHERE
YOU WILL LIVE ALONE.
WHEN THE NEXT PERSON JOINS YOU
ON REDEMPTION ISLAND, THE TWO OF
YOU WILL SQUARE OFF IN A DUEL.
>> WHAT?
>> Jeff: THE WINNER STAYS.
THE LOSER IS OUT OF THE GAME FOR GOOD.
AT THE ZAPATERA TRIBE, RUSSELL
LOST NO TIME ALIGNING WITH THE
PRETTY YOUNG TRIBEMATE.
>> WHEN WE GET TO THE MERGE, IT WILL BE OVER.
>> DONE.
>> Jeff: BUT EVERYONE ELSE IMMEDIATELY FIGURED OUT WHAT
RUSSELL WAS UP TO.
>> AT THIS POINT, GET RUSSELL
GONE AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.
>> Jeff: AT THE OMETEPE TRIBE,
ALMOST EVERYONE FELL UNDER
BOSTON ROB'S CHARISMATIC SPELL.
>> IT'S SUCH A BLESSING TO HAVE ROB HERE.
WE MIGHT AS WELL CALL IT CAMP HARMONY RIGHT NOW.

ROB WAS TOO DANGEROUS TO KEEP
AROUND SO SHE JOINED FORCES WITH
PHILLIP AND FRANCESCA TO GET HIM OUT.
>> I'M TOTALLY ON BOARD. >> OKAY, COOL.

HER PLAN SEEMED FOOLPROOF.
AT TRIBAL COUNCIL PHILLIP TURNED
ON HIS ALLIES AND SPILLED THE
BEANS TO HIS ENTIRE TRIBE.
>> YOU AND FRANCESCA APPROACHED
ME TO GO ALONG WITH THEM BECAUSE
SHE HAS AN IMMUNITY IDOL.
JEFF, I'M A FORMER SPECIAL AGENT.
>> ARE YOU A CRAZY PERSON.
>> Jeff: FRANCESCA WAS VOTED OUT.
THE TRIBE HAS SPOKEN.
BUT YOU WILL HAVE A CHANCE TO
RE-ENTER THIS GAME.
TAKE YOUR TORCH.
HEAD TO REDEMPTION ISLAND.

AFTER WHAT HAPPENED AT TRIBAL
COUNCIL TONIGHT, IT'S BEEN KIND OF DOWNHILL.
NOW REDEMPTION ISLAND, MY MIND
IS JUST RACING.
I DON'T THINK I'M GOING TO SLEEP TONIGHT.
I DON'T REALLY SEE HOW I CAN SLEEP TONIGHT.
I DON'T KNOW WHAT I'M GOING TO DO.

WILL HAVE BASIC SUPPLIES TO HELP
YOU MAINTAIN YOUR WORLD HERE.

RICE EACH DAY AND PLENTY OF DRINKING WATER.

REMAINING PERSON ON REDEMPTION
ISLAND WILL RE-ENTER THE GAME
AND RESUME THEIR QUEST FOR THE
TITLE OF SOLE SURVIVOR AND THE
MILLION-DOLLAR PRIZE.
GOOD LUCK.

NOT LIKE THAT.
